general_provisions: This bill establishes comprehensive student attendance monitoring, chronic absenteeism supports, and accountability requirements for local education agencies.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>establishes comprehensive student attendance monitoring and accountability requirements;<hr><ltbullet>requires local education agencies to implement enhanced attendance tracking and intervention programs;<hr><ltbullet>mandates performance metrics for attendance notifications and enforcement actions;<hr><ltbullet>creates data quality standards for student participation reporting; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical changes.
last_action: House/ return to Rules due to fiscal impact
